remarks: Derive eventual boundedness from separate upper and lower eventual bounds.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Apr-2016.)
statement:
icco1.1 $e |- ( ph -> A C_ RR ) $.
icco1.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B e. RR ) $.
icco1.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. RR ) $.
icco1.4 $e |- ( ph -> M e. RR ) $.
icco1.5 $e |- ( ph -> N e. RR ) $.
icco1.6 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. A /\ C <_ x ) ) -> B e. ( M [,] N ) ) $.
icco1 $p |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> B ) e. O(1) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d C x $.
$d M x $.
$d N x $.
$d ph x $.
